body.name: Band-Aid Waterproof Tape, 1 Inch
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 58 mins
features: .5-inch by 10 yard-roll of Band-Aid Brand of First Aid Products Waterproof Adhesive Tape works to firmly secure dressings or bandages to wounds
Designed to be 100% waterproof, this self-adhesive bandaging tape stays on, even when wet, so bandages stay secure in the shower without coming loose
This wound care tape is designed to tear easily by hand without the need for scissors, and can be customized to fit any size bandage for optimal first aid wound care
It's available in a convenient roll which helps keep this first aid tape clean and allows for easy storage
Experience durable wound protection and first aid with this waterproof self-adhesive bandage tape
body.description: Band-Aid Brand of First Aid Products Waterproof Tape firmly secures dressings or bandages to wounds, for advanced first aid protection. Designed to be 100% waterproof, it is durable, and stays on, even when wet, so bandages stay on in the shower or bath without coming loose. This adhesive bandaging tape comes in a convenient roll that keeps the tape clean, and it tears easily by hand, so it can be customized to fit any size bandage.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #98,857 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #213 in First Aid Tape

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Looking Back While Moving Forward Our products have been used by millions—even billions—of people for more than a century, giving BAND-AID Brand an iconic place in American culture. We reached that place through a history of innovation, healing, and caring for our customers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adhesion is excellent. MUCH better than paper tape.
reviews.reviewText: This tape sticks!! AND, it tolerates water extremely well. Paper tape won't stick to skin that is damp or even recently was damp. Only thing I wish were different, the packaging looks cool but is decidedly awkward from a functionality perspective. But, the high quality of the product clearly overrides the difficult packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Manufacturers make so many different types of medical tape now that it’s hard to keep up with what’s on the market. I needed some waterproof tape and I was glad to see that it was the same Johnson & Johnson tape that I remember from my childhood. I do believe it’s a little thinner now, but it serves its purpose. It did everything that I required it to do. If you’re in need of waterproof medical tape, you can’t go wrong with ordering this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: I stubbed my pinky toe so badly in December that I'm pretty sure it was fractured. I started taping my pinky toe to the one next to it using this tape and it helped the pain immensely. Adhesion is great and was able to stay in place all day even with constant walking during my 10 hour shifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the same as the old Johnson & Johnson Waterproof tape
reviews.reviewText: I use this tape mostly to wrap my fingers when they get painful cracks due to dryness and overuse.This Johnson & Johnson "Water Block" tape does not stick as well as the old "Waterproof" tape version, but its a lot better than other generic store brands that I bought when I couldn't find this brand in the stores. It seems to be almost as waterproof as the old version. I haven't used it to tape bandages or dressing and I don't think it would work well for that.For people who have commented that its hard to get the tape out of the spool when it gets low, please know that the two sides of the plastic spool can come apart by twisting and pulling apart, then the tape can be removed, just like the old version ;-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't change a winning game!
reviews.reviewText: Thank you J&J for not changing this product. It's the same quality as it has always been, there is no deceptive shrinkage in size or downgrade in material. I generally apply this tape over a Band-Aid (J&J) to protect blisters that form from running, racket sports, etc. It keeps me in the game.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Husband likes it just fine
reviews.reviewText: He hurt his finger and uses the tape as a splint to keep it from bending. Says he likes the 1" tape better than the half inch for this purpose and hasn't complained about tape residue / glue not coming off or anything like that. It does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good if you don’t move
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I have hidradenitis suppurativa and when I have a break out I need to cover my wounds with gauze but finding an ouch-less yet adhesive tape is hard. I can say this is definitely an ouch-less tape, didn’t hurt taking it off at all. The problem lies with it not staying on. With hidradenitis suppurativa you break out in sensitive areas (Groin, private parts, bre@sts, armpits, etc.) and you need tape that’s gonna stay or else… it’s gonna be a mess.I tried this for a breakout under my bre@st. It stayed when I had a bra on but when my girls were free that’s a different story. I really wish it stuck better so I could give this 5 stars but unfortunately the adhesive needs to be better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got this for our first aid kit - works well
reviews.reviewText: It seemed much cheaper to order the specific things I wanted for the first aid kit so I ordered this as part of it. Works well. Very pleased. No complaints.
